entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible race in an Assert recently added to Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName #59395
  • Should "raw" string tokens be added to the set of tokens with text? #59391
  • Introduce API for determining which symbols within a reference were used #59389
  • Replace IDocumentExcerptService with LSP #59386
  • Create separate toggles for inline parameter hints and inline type hints #59380
  • Expand hints we show for users #59379
  • ValueTracker: avoid constructing symbols in-proc (on client) #59378
  • Attach binlog to successful builds #59374
  • Wrong defaults for code analysis rules #59371
  • Expose `NullableSyntaxAnnotation` #59368
  • CSC : warning AD0001: Analyzer 'MyApp.Analyzers.MyAnalyzer' threw an exception of type 'System.IO.FileNotFoundException' with message 'Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces, Version=2.9.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified.'. #59367
  • Discrepancy between code metadata and behavior for Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.BinaryOperator #59359

Closed

  • Analyzer driver fails to account for source generator outputs in ServiceHub #58916
    17.1
  • Find All References does not find all references #37793
    Backlog
  • record Equals/GetHashCode - use CompilerGenerated attribute #47613
  • All IsImplicitlyDecalred synthesized record members should probably have CompilerGeneratedAttribute applied to them in metadata #46439
  • Formatting doesn't respect new line for braces settings #50275
    Next
  • Fix and enable VSTHRD100 "Avoid async void methods" #38545
    Backlog
  • Clicking on inheritance margin does not open up (potentially due to VS being in Chinese) #53708
  • Intellisense suggests Nullable<T> properties in property pattens #39555
    Backlog
  • 'Use Range' code fix does not fully simplify 'Substring' #40438
    Next
  • IDE0019 fails with disposable #34068
    16.9.P1
  • SymbolFinder.FindImplementedInterfaceMembersAsync documentation is confusing and inaccurate #34588
    Backlog
  • Remove unnecessary parantheses is confused by nullable types #35239
    Backlog
  • No quick-fix for GetHashCode from on-hover suggestions context menu #41454
    Backlog
  • 'Use Range' code fix does not work with single-argument 'Substring' #40439
    17.0.P5
  • Inline-rename should remember the choices i made the last time i ran the feature. #56417
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify the wrapping code for initializer-expression wrapping #59397
    Area-IDE
  • Fix wrapping of PII value #59396
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Add Razor External Access APIs to allow passing classification options through ExcerptService #59394
    Area-IDE
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid eagerly realizing the declaration table #59392
    Area-Compilers
  • Support raw UTF8 String Literals #59390
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Support wrapping constructs even in the presence of some recoverable errors #59385
    Area-IDE
  • Add elastic space in IDE0063 codefix #59383
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge 'main' into 'features/rename_ui_rework' #59382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Consolidate classification of tracked item spans #59381
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Go To Implementation show metadata results" #59376
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of IAttributeOperation #59369
    Community
  • Improve 'object/collection initializer can be simplified' #59363
    Area-IDE
  • Fix NRE in DeclarationNameCompletionProvider #59361
    Area-IDE
  • Let Import Completion check for global usings auto-generated by SDK #59360
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Backport diagnostics error list property for liveshare to 16.11 #59344
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • [semi-auto-props]: Avoid using `IsAutoProperty` when possible #59109
    Area-Compilers
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59377
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add CompilerGeneratedAttribute to record members #58542
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Records, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59384
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Refactor IDE0003 (Qualify 'this'/'Me') #59102
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • [LSP] respect formatting options in snippets #59266
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Handle more cases in both new line formatting and curly brace completion #53222
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59365
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main into feature branch #59372
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid using 'async void' in AnalyzersCommandHandler #59358
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59375
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Follow up on LDM decisions made 2022-01-26 #59229
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59366
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Improve 'use range operator' in a common case #59357
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support the StringSyntax attribute actually being used on an attribute parameter. #59343
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Associate 'Generate GetHashCode' with a span #59354
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58989
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59355
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59356
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #59399
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Make GetDocumentWithFrozenPartialSemantics asynchronous #57830
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Trigger refactor notify on Renamer.RenameDocumentAsync #55033
    Area-IDE
  • Implement Initializer expression wrappers #39878
    Area-IDE, Community
  • More fault handling cleanup #59097
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Introduce local formatting #47510
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Attempt to fix Module naming style #47242
    Area-IDE, Community
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57172
    Area-Analyzers, Needs UX Triage
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the unescaped form of globalconfig section names #59301
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixed IDE0044 (Make Field Readonly) for DataMember fields in DataContract classes #43489
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support embedded languages in raw strings. #59348
    Area-IDE
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServieHub project - take 3 #59316
    Area-IDE
  • Finalize New Inline Rename UI #59351
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use one instance of MSBuild BuildManager per MSBuildWorkspace #52151
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for unsafe local functions in IDE0062 code fix #59297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove unneeded project references in EditorFeatures layer #51471
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Move net450 targets to net462 #59350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Respect ReportSuppressedDiagnostics option for DiagnosticSuppressor #53045
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix definite assignment crash with list-patterns #59285
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
